text: Sergal (Greek: Σερραϊκή Βιομηχανία Γάλακτος), Serres Milk Industry, is the name of a Greek dairy products company based in Serres, Macedonia, Greece. It was founded in 1964 by Agrotiki Bank and was sold to private sector in 1995.20 χρόνια ΣΕΡΓΑΛ ==References== Category:Food and drink companies of Greece Category:Greek brands Category:Food and drink companies established in 1964 Category:Companies based in Serres Category:Dairy products companies of Greece Category:Greek companies established in 1964
title: Sergal (dairy)
